content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSVCDREF
      operator: equal_to
      value: CDISC
    - name: TSVCDVER
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0289
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when TSVCDREF = 'CDISC' and TSVCDVER is not a valid published
  version (date)
Outcome:
  Message: TSVCDVER is not a valid published version (date)
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0289
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The version number of the Reference Terminology, if
                  applicable.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when TSVCDREF = 'CDISC' and TSVCDVER is not a valid published version (date)

Outcome.Message: TSVCDVER is not a valid published version (date)

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The version number of the Reference Terminology, if applicable.
